clause.title: Calculation of weighted efficiency index for unitary air conditioning equipment

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: The weighted efficiency index of unitary air-conditioning equipment must be calculated in accordance with the following formula:

callout.xt:author: Ian Findlay
callout.p: Variable refrigerant flow and multi-split systems are tested as representative combination.
